meanings.definition: Small or dainty in a pleasing way
meanings.sent1: The tiny kitten was much tiddlier than the big dog.
meanings.sent2: The delicate flower looked even tiddlier in the morning sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The tiddlier cupcakes were gone in seconds at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as tiddlier as a whisper in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The tiddlier jewelry sparkled like tiny stars on her neck.

meanings.definition: More small or dainty than something else
meanings.sent1: The new dress was tiddlier than her old one.
meanings.sent2: The teacup was tiddlier compared to the mug on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The tiddlier cookies disappeared faster than the larger ones.
meanings.sent4: Her steps became tiddlier as she approached the delicate glass vase.
meanings.sent5: The tiddlier snowflakes fell gently on the windowpane.
